title: Keen Comics
content:
I made a few (well only one right now) comics about keen.

[img]http://planetck.spatang.com/pics/garg-keen.png[/img]
[img]http://planetck.spatang.com/pics/garg-keen.GIF[/img]

And more to come...

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: hmm
content:
I don't want to be traditionalist or anything, but some sort of panelling would do wonders for the readability of the comic. Either put a frame here and there in a box to indicate a passage of time or a seperation of thoughts, or at least spread things out a bit more.

The art was pretty cute, though. :-) What'd you do it with?

title: Re: hmm
content: Hehe, excellent stuff! Really nice. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] More more!You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: hmm
content:
h. Not bad, not bad at all. We could see some creative paneling when you use it. [See Calvin and Hobbes for good examples]A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: hmm
content:
ROTFL! That's funny![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] The art is adorible![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I love it![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] All it needs are some panels...-------------------

title: Re: hmm
content:
Garg! I hate panels!!!
I drew it in Corel Painter Essentials 2 (it came free with the tablet), then i saved it as a bitmap, i put it in a shared folder, opened it on my XP computer, and saved it as .png. And now you want panels???


...


ok.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]
